price: 11. Kuwa dhaxli Al-Firdaws (Jannada sare) wayna ku dhex waadhi weligood.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: 2. Firdaws waa qaybta ugu heer sarreysa Jannada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
